passages.text: Market Insights | Markets | Asia市场洞察 | 市场动态 | 亚洲板块
Market Update - Indonesia FX & Rates - GS Asia EM Trading
市场动态——印尼外汇与利率 - 高盛亚洲新兴市场交易部
Latest Local Update: 最新本地动态：
- Protests have recently erupted in Indonesia, with thousands demonstrating against what they perceive as excessive privileges granted to members of parliament.
印度尼西亚近期爆发抗议活动，数千人示威反对他们认为议会成员享有的过度特权。
- On 28th August, protests escalated after a police armored vehicle ran over and killed motorbike taxi driver Affan Kurniawan during a protest in Jakarta on 28th August.
8月28日，在雅加达的抗议活动中，一辆警方装甲车碾压致死摩托车出租车司机Affan Kurniawan后，抗议活动升级。

- Over the weekend, among the ensuing violence, regional parliament buildings were set ablaze in multiple provinces—including West Nusa Tenggara, Central Java, and West Java—and other significant targets like the Finance Minister's residence were also attacked or lodged.
上周末，在随之而来的暴力事件中，包括西努沙登加拉、中爪哇和西爪哇在内的多个省份的地区议会大楼被纵火，财政部长官邸等其他重要目标也遭到袭击或洗劫。

- On 31st August (Sunday), in response, President Prabowo Subianto announced a rollback of lawmakers' perks, cancelled overseas trips, declared a crackdown on violent elements labeling some actions treasonous or terrorist, and deployed security forces to restore order.
8月31日（周日），作为回应，总统普拉博沃·苏比安托宣布撤销议员特权待遇、取消海外出访计划，并宣布将严厉打击暴力行为，将部分行动定性为叛国或恐怖主义活动，同时部署安全部队恢复秩序。
- Also worth highlighting, Coordinating Minister for Economic Affairs Airlangga Hartarto has also shut down rumors about Sri Mulyani resigning post the attack on her residence.
同样值得关注的是，经济事务协调部长艾尔朗加·哈尔塔托也已辟谣关于斯里·穆利亚尼在其住所遇袭后辞职的传言。
- Situation has since calmed down and no demonstration has been seen in the evening of \(31^{\text{st}}\) August so far.
局势目前已趋于平静，截至8月31日晚间尚未出现新的示威活动。
Source: Reuters, Jakarta Post and various local media
消息来源：路透社、雅加达邮报及多家当地媒体
USDIDR View: 美元/印尼盾观点：
Market movement 市场走势

After failing to break lower, 1s IDR spiked to as high as 16,540 driven by FPI hedging flows and short covering in view of the risk off sentiment following anti- government demonstrations in Indonesia. Protests have recently erupted in Indonesia, with thousands demonstrating against what they perceive as excessive privileges granted to members of parliament. Equities inflows came earlier ahead of rebalancing but inflows stalled in the second half of the week. We have been seeing aggressive selling interests on this spike higher from locals capping topside. 1m points traded to a high of +18 before settling in the range of +8- +11.
在未能向下突破后，1年期印尼盾汇率因外资组合投资的避险资金流和在反政府示威引发避险情绪下的空头回补，一度飙升至16,540高位。近期印尼爆发抗议活动，数千人示威反对他们认为议会成员享有的过度特权。股票资金流在指数调整前提前涌入，但下半周流入停滞。我们观察到本地投资者在此波涨势中积极卖出，限制了上行空间。1个月远期点差曾触及+18高点，最终在+8至+11区间企稳。
Flows have been skewed to RHS in the offshore space - bonds/equities hedging and short covering from macro names. LHS IMM rolls started to come in from CTAs.
离岸市场资金流明显偏向买入方——来自宏观投资者的债券/股票对冲及空头回补。商品交易顾问开始进行左侧的 IMM 合约展期操作。

We expect further de- risking and hedging flows to come through in the next few sessions. Nevertheless, we also expect BI to cap topside and we continue to think that IDR is cheap at current levels in the medium term. Development of the protests onshore is to be closely watched
我们预计未来几个交易日内将进一步出现风险规避和对冲资金流动。尽管如此，我们也预期印尼央行将限制上行空间，并继续认为中期来看印尼盾在当前水平被低估。需密切关注境内抗议活动的发展态势
Key levels in 1s: resistance 16,540 and 16,730 and support 16,330 and 16,280.
Trade(s) we like: 我们看好的交易：/ Sell USDIDR on spikes closer to 16,700- 16,730
/ 在 16,700- 16,730 附近高位卖出美元兑印尼盾
/ Buy Sep/Dec IDR IMM points at +28 levels
/ 在 +28 点水平买入 9 月/12 月印尼盾 IMM 价差
Indo Rates View: 印尼利率展望: Market movement 市场走势

We continued to see strong IndoGBs buying interest across client segment post BI cut 25bps on 20th August with policy rate to \(5.00\%\) (25bps rate cut was a \(50\%\) probability event) and tied to 5y IndoGB trading upto \(5.65\%\) and 10y IndoGb trading upto \(6.30\%\) level. Auction last week also saw strong 126tn bids impact as new buyers emerged from FM/RMs community as terminal rate by few banks in the street started to price in \(4.25 - 4.5\%\) zone. Our estimate has been \(4.75\%\) as we think USDIDR will find it tough to break 16000 and BI additional cuts will be based on how much FED cuts in REMCY25.

在8月20日印尼央行降息25个基点（政策利率降至 \(5.00\%\) ，此次降息概率原为 \(50\%\) ）后，我们观察到各客户板块对印尼国债(IndoGBs)的强劲买需持续。这推动5年期印尼国债收益率升至 \(5.65\%\) ，10年期攀升至 \(6.30\%\) 水平。上周的国债拍卖也录得12.6万亿印尼盾的强劲投标量，因来自资金管理/风险管理领域的新买家入场一部分机构已开始将终端利率定价在 \(4.25 - 4.5\%\) 区间。我们维持 \(4.75\%\) 的预估，认为美元兑印尼盾难以突破16000关口，且印尼央行后续降息将取决于美联储2025年的降息幅度。

One of the main reasons of August IndoGBs rally has been aggressive b/s swap done by BI which kept FX implies as low as \(4.6\%\) for most part of August month and we think this can revert back now due to increased hedging pressure that might come up as ongoing local risk off driven by protests against some of the government policies. This sudden political unrest should keep importers hedge in fx swap and if hedging cost increases from here in onshore/offshore market, IndoGBs may start seeing increased selling pressure.
八月印尼国债走强的主因之一是央行积极进行的买/卖互换操作，该操作使整个八月大部分时间的外汇隐含收益率维持在 \(4.6\%\) 低位。但我们认为当前可能发生逆转，由于针对部分政府政策的抗议活动引发本土避险情绪，或将加剧对冲压力。这种突发政治动荡将促使进口商通过外汇互换进行对冲，若在岸/离岸市场对冲成本从当前水平上升，印尼国债可能开始面临更大的抛压。
We are turning neutral on IndoGBs at this juncture given -
鉴于以下因素，我们目前对印尼国债转为中性立场：

1) the risk of sustained political instability that can impact ongoing Prabowo policies  
1) 持续政治不稳定的风险可能影响现任普拉博沃政策的延续性  
2) increased hedging can lead to fx implies moving higher making IndoGb unattractive (major reason for rally in August)  
2) 对冲需求增加可能导致外汇隐含收益率上升，使印尼国债吸引力下降（这是8月反弹的主要原因）  
3) USDIDR topside risk may keep BI hawkish on its 17Sep policy and heavy long positioning can lead to a retracement by 25bps  
3) 美元/印尼盾上行风险可能促使印尼央行在9月17日政策会议上保持鹰派立场，而沉重的多头头寸可能导致25个基点的回调
Positioning\*：持仓情况\*：Net - 3 净持仓 - 3RMs - 2.5 关系经理 - 2.5FMs - 3 基金经理 - 3Interbank - 3.5 银行间市场 - 3.5 基点
\*Scale from - 5[max rec]/+5[max paid]
\*评分范围从- 5[最大推荐]/+5[最大支付]

Strong IndoGB buying from fast money and real money throughout last week (with auction saw 126T of bids even at \(5.73\%\) 5y average yield which shows the intensity of buying that went through) when Bl cut 25bps to \(5\%\) with dovish tone. We saw locals were taking profits vs strong offshore buying as well as month end rebalancing buying flows till 29th August. Once the local protest went widespread to Jakarta as well as other big cities Sumatra/Java, we saw massive selling interest emerged from real money and few fast money players on Friday ahead of weekend risk reduction.

上周塑周快钱与实钱资金持续强劲买入印尼国债（即便5年期平均收益率达 \(5.73\%\) 时拍卖仍录得126万亿投标量，可见买盘力度之强），因印尼央行降息25个基点至 \(5\%\) 并释放鸽派信号。我们观察到本土投资者在强劲离岸买盘及月末再平衡资金流入（持续至8月29日th）的背景下获利了结。随着当地抗议活动蔓延至雅加达及苏门答腊/爪哇等主要城市，周五实钱资金与部分快钱玩家在周末风险规避前涌现大规模抛售兴趣。

5y IndoGBs traded upto \(5.65\%\) post Bl cut on 20th August and 10y IndogB traded upto \(6.30\%\) - going ahead due to risk of fx blow up both in spot as well as points, we think its time to pare long Indogb risk by \(50 - 70\%\) and pay NDS to manage the ongoing local risk off. We think 5y IndoGB has risk to move towards \(6.10\%\) and 10y IndoGB can test \(6.70\%\) with bear flattening moves as more sensitive FMs positioning is in 5y. We would like to see how the current political instability pans out and then we can consider it buying back again once the current risk premium gets adjusted in the IndoGB curve.

5年期印尼国债收益率在8月20日印尼央行降息后最高触及 \(5.65\%\) ，10年期印尼国债收益率最高升至 \(6.30\%\) 一考虑到即期汇率和远期点都存在爆发性风险，我们认为当前应削减 \(50 - 70\%\) 的印尼国债多头敞口，并通过支付NDS来管理本地的避险情绪。预计5年期印尼国债收益率可能上行至 \(6.10\%\) ，10年期收益率或将测试 \(6.70\%\) 水平，由于对冲基金在5年期持仓更为敏感，收益率曲线将呈现熊平走势。我们将观察当前政治不稳定局势的演变，待印尼国债曲线中的风险溢价调整到位后，再考虑重新建仓。
Trade Idea: 2x5 IDR NDS Entry 45- 50 zone, TP 20, SL 60
交易策略：2x5年期印尼盾NDS入场区间45- 50基点，目标20基点，止损60基点

BI have been aggressively selling 1y implies which pushed 2y IDR NDS lower as well and 2x5 IDR NDS at 1.8 sigma level in last 1 year. Due to this political unrest taking traction, NDs curve can bear flatten as we have started to see on Friday itself. At this point the NDS curve in 2x5 gives an opportunity to trade any blow up in front end points.
印尼央行近期持续大举抛售1年期隐含远期合约，导致2年期印尼盾NDS同步走低，2x5年期印尼盾NDS在过去一年处于1.8个标准差水平。受政治动荡加剧影响，NDS曲线已如我们上周五所见开始呈现熊平走势。当前2x5年期NDS曲线为交易远期点爆发提供了操作机会。

Source: All charts and figures from Goldman Sachs, Global banking and markets, as of 1Sep25. Past performance is not indicative of future performance.
来源：所有图表和数据均来自高盛全球银行与市场部，截至2025年9月1日。过往表现不代表未来业绩。
All references to "we/us/our" refer to the views and observations of the desk. Trade ideas in this piece may have an unlimited potential loss.
所有提及“我们/我方”之处均代表交易台的观点与观察。本文所涉交易策略可能存在无限潜在亏损风险。

Terms of the Transaction: To understand clearly the terms and conditions of any OTC derivative transaction you may enter into, you should carefully review the Master Agreement, including any related schedules, credit support documents, addenda and exhibits. You should not enter into OTC derivative transactions unless you understand the terms of the transaction you are entering into as well as the nature and extent of your risk exposure. You should also be satisfied that the OTC derivative transaction is appropriate for you in light of your circumstances and financial condition. You may be requested to post margin or collateral to support written OTC derivatives at levels consistent with the internal policies of Goldman Sachs.

Liquidity Risk: There is no public market for OTC derivative transactions and, therefore, it may be difficult or impossible to liquidate an existing position on favorable terms. Transfer Restrictions: OTC derivative transactions entered into with one or more affiliates of The Goldman Sachs Group, Inc. (Goldman Sachs) cannot be assigned or otherwise transferred without its prior written consent and, therefore, it may be impossible for you to transfer any OTC derivative transaction to a third party.

Conflict of Interests: Goldman Sachs may from time to time be an active participant on both sides of the market for the underlying securities, commodities, futures, options or any other derivative or instrument identical or related to those mentioned herein (together, "the Product"). Goldman Sachs at any time may have long or short positions in, or buy and sell Products (on a principal basis or otherwise) identical or related to those mentioned herein. Goldman Sachs hedging and trading activities may affect the value of the Products.

Counterparty Credit Risk: Because Goldman Sachs, may be obligated to make substantial payments to you as a condition of an OTC derivative transaction, you must evaluate the credit risk of doing business with Goldman Sachs or its affiliates.

Pricing and Valuation: The price of each OTC derivative transaction is individually negotiated between Goldman Sachs and each counterparty and Goldman Sachs does not represent or warrant that the prices for which it offers OTC derivative transactions are the best prices available, possibly making it difficult for you to establish what is a fair price for a particular OTC derivative transaction; The value or quoted price of the Product at any time, however, will reflect many factors and cannot be predicted. If Goldman Sachs makes a market in the offered Product, the price quoted by Goldman Sachs would reflect any changes in market conditions and other relevant factors, and the quoted price (and the value of the Product that Goldman Sachs will use for account statements or otherwise) could be higher or lower than the original price, and may be higher or lower than the value of the Product as determined by reference to pricing models used by Goldman Sachs. If at any time a third party dealer quotes a price to purchase the Product or otherwise values the Product, that price may be significantly different (higher or lower) than any price quoted by Goldman Sachs. Furthermore, if you sell the Product, you will likely be charged a commission for secondary market transactions, or the price will likely reflect a dealer discount. Goldman Sachs may conduct market making activities in the Product. To the extent Goldman Sachs makes a market, any price quoted for the OTC derivative transactions, Goldman Sachs may differ significantly from (i) their value determined by reference to Goldman Sachs pricing models and (ii) any price quoted by a third party. The market price of the OTC derivative transaction may be influenced by many unpredictable factors, including economic conditions, the creditworthiness of Goldman Sachs, the value of any underlyers, and certain actions taken by Goldman Sachs.

Market Making, Investing and Lending: Goldman Sachs engages in market making, investing and lending businesses for its own account and the accounts of its affiliates in the same or similar instruments underlying OTC derivative transactions (including such trading as Goldman Sachs deems appropriate in its sole discretion to hedge its market risk in any OTC derivative transaction whether between Goldman Sachs and you or with third parties) and such trading may affect the value of an OTC derivative transaction.

Early Termination Payments: The provisions of an OTC Derivative Transaction may allow for early termination and, in such cases, either you or Goldman Sachs may be required to make a potentially significant termination payment depending upon whether the OTC Derivative Transaction is in- the- money to Goldman Sachs or you at the time of termination. Indexes: Goldman Sachs does not warrant, and takes no responsibility for, the structure, method of computation or publication of any currency exchange rates, interest rates, indexes of such rates, or credit, equity or other indexes, unless Goldman Sachs specifically advises you otherwise.

Risk Disclosure Regarding futures, options, equity swaps, and other derivatives as well as non- investment- grade securities and ADRs: Please ensure that you have read and understood the current options, futures and security futures disclosure document before entering into any such transactions. Current United States listed options, futures and security futures disclosure documents are available from our sales representatives or at http://www.w.theocc.com/compontents/docs/riskstoc.pdf, http://www.goldmansachs.com/disclosures/risk- disclosure- for- futures.pdf and https://www.n.fa.futures.org/investors/investor- resources/files/security- futures- disclosure.pdf, respectively. Certain transactions - including those involving futures, options, equity swaps, and other derivatives as well as non- investment- grade securities - give rise to substantial risk and are not available to nor suitable for all investors. If you have any questions about whether you are eligible to enter into these transactions with Goldman Sachs, please contact your sales representative. Foreign- currency- denominated securities are subject to fluctuations in exchange rates that could have an adverse effect on the value or price of, or income derived from, the investment. In addition, investors in securities such as ADRs, the values of which are influenced by foreign currencies, effectively assume currency risk.

Options Risk Disclosures: Options may trade at a value other than that which may be inferred from the current levels of interest rates, dividends (if applicable) and the underlier due to other factors including, but not limited to, expectations of future levels of interest rates, future levels of dividends and the volatility of the underlier at any time prior to maturity. Note: Options involve risk and are not suitable for all investors. Please ensure that you have read and understood the current options disclosure document before entering into any standardized options transactions. United States listed options disclosure documents are available from our sales representatives or at http://theocc.com/publications/risks/riskstoc.pdf. A secondary market may not be available for all options. Transaction costs may be a

significant factor in option strategies calling for multiple purchases and sales of options, such as spreads. When purchasing long options an investor may lose their entire investment and when selling uncovered options the risk is potentially unlimited. Supporting documentation for any comparisons, recommendations, statistics, technical data, or other similar information will be supplied upon request.

Hedging of risk arising from a barrier option or similar product may impact whether or not the relevant barrier is breached and the value of the product. Contact your sales representative for further information.
